dcterms:description: The Chaotic World dataset consists of a total of 378,093 annotated instances for triangulating the source of sound for Event Sound Source Localization. It aims to analyze multiple dimensions of a scene to study human behavior in chaotic situations and understand the nature of human behavior during chaotic events.
dcterms:title: Chaotic World dataset

dcterms:description: Flickr-SoundNet is a dataset used for learning sound representations from unlabeled video.
